hook.en: Have you ever received a message that looked urgent — a bank alert or parcel delivery link? That's often phishing.
hook.ta: Ungalukku urgent message vandhadha? Adhu bank alert maathiri irukkum, aana adhu spoofed aag irukka mudiyum.

definition.en: Phishing is when fake messages or links trick you into giving your personal details or installing malware.
definition.ta: Phishing na enga enga ungaloda personal info-ai theduvathu, kadai link-click panna virus varum.

en: Open the official app or website directly.
Check the link by long-pressing to preview.

closing.en: Next, we'll show a short quiz — try to spot the fake message!
